Entries.1: Location/Meet The {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Wizard:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WizardGender}}}}/You received a letter from the local {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Wizard:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WizardGender}}}}. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WizardGender}}}} claims to have information regarding the old community center./Enter the {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Wizard:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WizardGender}}}}'s tower./WizardHouse/-1/0/-1/false
Entries.2: Basic/The Mysterious {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/QiName}}/Within a secret lock-box, you found a note with peculiar instructions. It's signed by a '{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Mr:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/QiGender}}}}. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/QiName}}'./Leave a rainbow shell in the box at the train platform./null/-1/0/-1/false
Entries.3: Basic/The Mysterious {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/QiName}}/You've found another note written by '{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Mr:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/QiGender}}}}. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/QiName}}'. The request is even more unusual this time./Place 10 beets inside Mayor {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisName}}' fridge./null/-1/0/-1/false
Entries.4: Basic/The Mysterious {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/QiName}}/You've found yet another strange note within the Mayor's fridge. This time, the instructions are more cryptic./"Give the sand dragon his final meal."/null/-1/0/-1/false
Entries.5: Basic/The Mysterious {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/QiName}}/You found another note in the sand dragon's eye. It seems {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Mr:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/QiGender}}}}. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/QiName}}'s strange scavenger hunt has come to an end./Inspect the lumber pile beside your house./null/-1/0/-1/false
Entries.7: Building/Raising Animals/{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/RobinName}}, the local carpenter, lives north of town. In exchange for raw materials and money, she'll construct new buildings on your farm. You'll need her to build a coop or barn so that you can raise animals./Build a Coop./Coop/-1/100/-1/true
Entries.10: Basic/Copper Ore/You found a piece of copper ore. You're not sure what you can use it for, but the local blacksmith ought to know./Bring a piece of copper ore to {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ClintName}}'s blacksmith shop././-1/0/-1/false
Entries.12: ItemHarvest/Smelting/Now that you've built a furnace, you can smelt some metal. According to {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ClintName}}'s instructions, if you place 5 copper ore and 1 piece of coal in the furnace, it should produce a copper bar./Use your furnace to smelt a Copper Bar./334 1/-1/0/-1/true
Entries.13: Basic/To The Beach/Someone named {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WillyName}} invited you to visit the beach south of town. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WillyGender}}}} says {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WillyGender}}}} has something to give you./Visit the beach south of town before 5:00pm./-1/-1/0/-1/true
Entries.14: Basic/Explore The Mine/There's an old mine shaft in the mountains north of town. There could be valuable minerals inside, but {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MarlonName}} hinted that it might be dangerous./Reach level 5 in the mines./17/17/0/-1/false
Entries.20: Basic/{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/QiName}}'s Challenge/You've been challenged to reach level 25 in the skull cavern. You've been promised a substantial reward if you're successful./Reach level 25 in the Skull Cavern./-1/-1/0/-1/false
Entries.21: Basic/{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MarnieName}}'s Request/{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MarnieName}} came by the farm and asked if you'd bring her a cave carrot. She's trying to train her goats to speak, and cave carrot is their favorite snack./Bring a Cave Carrot into {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MarnieName}}'s shop./-1/-1/0/-1/true
Entries.22: Basic/Fish Casserole/{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/JodiName}} swung by the farm to ask you to dinner at 7:00 PM. Her only request was that you bring a largemouth bass for her fish casserole./Enter {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/JodiName}}'s house with a largemouth bass at 7:00 PM./-1/-1/0/-1/true
Entries.23: Location/Archaeology/You found an ancient-looking object. Could it be some kind of artifact from long ago? Perhaps {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GuntherName}}, curator of the local museum, has the answer./Visit {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GuntherName}} at the museum./ArchaeologyHouse/-1/0/-1/true
Entries.24: Basic/Archaeology/{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GuntherName}} asked if you'd consider donating any new artifacts or minerals you find to the museum. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GuntherGender}}}} says {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GuntherGender}}}}'ll compensate you by way of occasional rare goods./Donate an artifact or a mineral to the museum./-1/-1/250/-1/true
Entries.27: Basic/Goblin Problem/There's a goblin blocking the path to the {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Wizard:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WitchGender}}}}'s hut. There must be some way to get {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Him:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HenchmanGender}}}} to move... Perhaps I should seek out more information on Goblins./Gain entrance to the {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Wizard:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WitchGender}}}}'s hut./-1/-1/0/-1/true
Entries.28: Basic/Dark Talisman/The {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Wizard:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WizardGender}}}} asked me to retrieve the magic ink from {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/His:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WizardGender}}}} ex-{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Husband:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WitchGender}}}}'s house... but to gain access I'll need a dark talisman./Enter the sewer and ask {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/KrobusName}} about the dark talisman./-1/-1/0/-1/false
Entries.100: LostItem/{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/RobinName}}'s Lost Axe/{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/RobinName}} lost her favorite axe. The last time she remembers using it, she was cutting wood south of {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MarnieName}}'s ranch./Find {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/RobinName}}'s lost axe./Robin 788 Forest 110 81/-1/250/-1/true/Hey, you found my axe! What a relief... I almost chopped my toe off with the other one I was using. Thank you!
Entries.101: ItemDelivery/{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/JodiName}}'s Request/{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/JodiName}} needs a fresh cauliflower for a recipe she's making. She's asking you to bring her one./Bring {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/JodiName}} a cauliflower./Jodi 190/-1/350/-1/true/Oh, that looks so delicious! Thank you, this is just what I wanted. It's going to be perfect for my yellow curry.
Entries.102: LostItem/Mayor's "Shorts"/Mayor {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisName}} has lost {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/His:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisGender}}}} purple "shorts". {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisGender}}}}'s asking you to find and return them... Discreetly./Find and return Mayor {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisName}}' purple shorts./Lewis 789 AnimalShop 13 7/-1/750/-1/true/You found them... where? ...Oh!...Uhmm...Heh.#$b#There? I have no idea how they could've gotten there...*cough*#$b#This stays between you and me. Got it?$u
Entries.103: ItemDelivery/{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PamName}} Is Thirsty/{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PamName}} is hankerin' for a pale ale. Regular old beer won't do. You can brew one yourself if you have hops and a keg./Bring {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PamName}} a pale ale./Pam 303/-1/350/-1/true/Gimme that. *slurp*... Ahh, that's the stuff.#$b#It's real nice and hoppy... notes of citrus and pine, but with a robust body to keep it grounded.#$b#Thanks, kid. This means a lot to me. I knew I could count on you.$h
Entries.104: ItemDelivery/Crop Research/{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/DemetriusName}} needs a fresh melon for {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/His:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/DemetriusGender}}}} research./Bring {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/DemetriusName}} a melon./Demetrius 254/-1/550/-1/true/This is perfect! It's just what I need for my research. It's going to be hard not to eat it! Thanks a bunch.
Entries.105: ItemDelivery/Knee Therapy/{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeName}} needs a hot pepper to soothe {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/His:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeGender}}}} aching knee./Bring {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeName}} a Hot Pepper./George 260/-1/200/-1/true/Took you long enough... hmmph... Well it's good and spicy at least. Thanks.
Entries.106: ItemDelivery/Cow's Delight/{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MarnieName}} wants to give her cows a special treat. She's asking for a single bunch of amaranth./Bring {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MarnieName}} one bunch of amaranth./Marnie 300/-1/500/-1/true/Oh, the amaranth I asked for! Thank you so much... my cows are going to love this!$h
Entries.107: LostItem/Blackberry Basket/It's blackberry season, but {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LinusName}} can't find {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/His:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LinusGender}}}} basket! {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LinusGender}}}}'s asking you to help {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Him:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LinusGender}}}} find it. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LinusGender}}}} has no idea where it is./Find {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LinusName}}' basket and return it to {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Him:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LinusGender}}}}./Linus 790 Backwoods 27 27/-1/0/-1/true/My basket! Thank you. This means a lot to me.$h
Entries.108: ItemDelivery/Carving Pumpkins/{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/CarolineName}} wants to carve a pumpkin with her daughter. She asked you to bring her one from the farm./Bring {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/CarolineName}} a pumpkin./Caroline 276/-1/500/-1/true/Oh, the pumpkin! It's a good one... {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AbigailName}} will be so happy when she sees this. Thanks, @!$h
Entries.109: ItemDelivery/Catch A Squid/{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WillyName}} is challenging you to catch a squid. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WillyGender}}}} says you can fish them from the ocean on winter nights./Bring {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WillyName}} a squid./Willy 151/-1/800/-1/true/Hey, you did it! Not bad. Not bad at all. I'm impressed.#$b#Winter's a good time to break out the old fishing rod, isn't it?
Entries.110: ItemDelivery/{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ClintName}}'s Attempt/{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ClintName}} wants you to give {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/EmilyName}} an amethyst. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ClintGender}}}} wants you to tell her it's from {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Him:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ClintGender}}}}./Bring {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/EmilyName}} an Amethyst./Emily 66/-1/0/-1/true/Oh, my favorite stone! You're so sweet!$h#$b#Huh? It's from who?$u#$b#Oh, you got it at {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ClintName}}'s? Well I don't care where you got it from, it's beautiful! Thank you! *smooch*$h
Entries.111: ItemDelivery/A Dark Reagent/The {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Wizard:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WizardGender}}}} wants you to descend into the mines and fetch {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Him:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WizardGender}}}} a Void Essence. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WizardGender}}}} needs it for some kind of dark magic./Bring {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Wizard:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WizardGender}}}} a Void Essence./Wizard 769/-1/1000/-1/true/Ah, you've brought it. You've earned my gratitude, and a 1000g reward. Now go.
Entries.112: ItemDelivery/A Favor For {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ClintName}}/{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ClintName}} got a new hammer and {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ClintGender}}}} wants to test it out on a variety of metals./Bring {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ClintName}} an Iron Bar./Clint 335/-1/500/-1/true/Hey, it's the iron bar I asked for. It looks strong... perfect.#$b#Thanks, @. I appreciate this.
Entries.113: ItemDelivery/{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/RobinName}}'s Request/{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/RobinName}} wrote to you asking for some hardwood./Bring {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/RobinName}} 10 pieces of Hardwood./Robin 709 10/-1/500/-1/true/Oh, you brought it! I know I can always count on you, @.$h#$b#Mmhmm... This wood is perfect. It's exactly what I need. Thanks!
Entries.114: ItemDelivery/Fish Stew/{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GusName}} wants to make fish stew, but {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GusGender}}}} needs an albacore./Bring {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GusName}} an Albacore./Gus 705/-1/400/-1/true/*sniff*...*sniff*... What's that? Something smells like albacore!#$b#Aha! You brought it! Thanks a million!
Entries.115: ItemDelivery/Fresh Fruit/{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/EmilyName}} wants a taste of spring. She's asking for a fresh apricot./Bring {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/EmilyName}} an Apricot./Emily 634/-1/600/-1/true/Oh... You followed through! Thanks, this looks delicious!$h
Entries.116: ItemDelivery/Granny's Gift/{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/EvelynName}} wants to surprise her {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Husband:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeGender}}}} with a gift./Bring {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/EvelynName}} a Leek./Evelyn 20/-1/500/-1/true/Oh, thank you, dear. This leek looks delicious. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeName}} will be so happy.#$b#{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeGender}}}} loves when I make eggs with leeks for breakfast.
Entries.117: ItemDelivery/{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreName}}'s Notice/{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreName}} will pay "top coin" to whoever brings {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Him:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreGender}}}} a plate of sashimi. Apparently {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreGender}}}}'s really craving the stuff./Bring {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreName}} some Sashimi./Pierre 227/-1/1000/-1/true/It's about time! I was starting to get the shakes, I wanted this fish so bad. *munch*... Mmm, now that's good.#$b#Thanks, @.$h
Entries.118: ItemDelivery/Aquatic Research/{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/DemetriusName}} is studying the toxin levels of the local pufferfish. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/DemetriusGender}}}}'d like you to bring {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Him:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/DemetriusGender}}}} one./Bring {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/DemetriusName}} a Pufferfish./Demetrius 128/-1/1000/-1/true/There you are. The specimen looks perfect. I'm going to get it on ice straight away. Thanks, @!
Entries.119: ItemDelivery/A Soldier's Star/{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/KentName}} wants to give {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/His:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/KentGender}}}} wife a starfruit for their anniversary./Bring {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/KentName}} a Starfruit./Kent 268/-1/500/-1/true/Hey. Shhh... Don't let {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/JodiName}} see.#$b#Ah, this looks juicy. She'll love it. Thank you so much.$h
Entries.120: ItemDelivery/Mayor's Need/Mayor {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisName}} wants truffle oil. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisGender}}}} won't explain what it's for. Maybe it's none of your business./Bring {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisName}} a bottle of Truffle Oil./Lewis 432/-1/750/-1/true/You got the oil? Let me see...#$b#It's high quality... very slick. Great. Thank you.
Entries.121: ItemDelivery/Wanted: Lobster/{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GusName}} put out a notice requesting a fresh lobster./Bring {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GusName}} a Lobster./Gus 715/-1/500/-1/true/Something smells like fresh lobster. Oh, that's good.$h#$b#Take care, friend.
Entries.122: ItemDelivery/{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PamName}} Needs Juice/{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PamName}}'s TV Remote is dead. She's having a tough time going back and forth between the couch and the TV dial./Bring {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PamName}} a Battery Pack./Pam 787/-1/400/-1/true/Hey, you pulled through with the battery pack! Thanks, kid... You're a life-saver!$h
Entries.123: ItemDelivery/Staff Of Power/The {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Wizard:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WizardGender}}}} is creating a staff of phenomenal power. Who knows what it's for. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WizardGender}}}} needs an iridium bar to finish it./Bring {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Wizard:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WizardGender}}}} an Iridium Bar./Wizard 337/-1/5000/-1/true/Ah, precious iridium. You've done well, @. You have my gratitude. Now, leave.
Entries.124: ItemDelivery/Catch a Lingcod/{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WillyName}} is challenging you to catch a Lingcod./Bring {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WillyName}} a Lingcod./Willy 707/-1/550/-1/true/Hey, that's a real lunker! You've certainly got the angler's blood in you.$h
Entries.125: ItemDelivery/Exotic Spirits/{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GusName}} wants to make a Coco-no-no, but {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GusGender}}}}'s missing the main ingredient./Bring {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GusName}} a Coconut./Gus 88/-1/600/-1/true/Coconut! Now there's a soothing sight for my winter eyes.$h#$b#It's going to be perfect for my coco-no-no. Thanks!
Entries.126: ItemDelivery/Errand for your Wife/Your wife asked you to bring her 200 pieces of fiber for a secret project./Bring {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/EmilyName}} 200 fiber./Emily 771 200/-1/0/-1/false/Oh, this looks perfect... and it's sustainably sourced, too! Thanks so much, @.$h#$b#Now, I've got my work cut out for me. It'll be a few more days before it's ready...
Entries.127: Basic/{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HaleyName}}'s Cake-Walk/Your wife is organizing a charity cake-walk in the town square. She asked you to bring a chocolate cake./Enter Town on a sunny morning with a chocolate cake./-1/-1/0/-1/true
